title: At least 9 killed, many injured in shootings at Canada school and home
summary_full: Canadian Prime Minister Mark Carney said he was “devastated” by the shootings, which took place at Tumbler Ridge Secondary School in British Columbia and in a residence.
summary_public: Canadian Prime Minister Mark Carney said he was “devastated” by the shootings, which took place at Tumbler Ridge Secondary School in British Columbia and in a residence.
